items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
items.title: GLINCKER/glin-profanity: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.

items.content_html: An experimental library for rendering web components. It captures the main ideas of React but is lightweight. Great for trying out new ideas or building simple web apps.
items.title: arwysyah/ArcNode: An experimental library for rendering web components. It captures the main ideas of React but is lightweight. Great for trying out new ideas or building simple web apps.

items.content_html: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, and count previous usernames through the API.
items.title: pertinentes/safeness-prevnames: The safeness-prevnames module is a lightweight Node.js client designed to interact with an API that stores previous usernames of Discord users. This client allows you to retrieve, save, delete, and count previous usernames through the API.

items.content_html: OJParty is a lightweight Node.js framework that enhances the default HTTP module by offering Express-like routing with added support for file uploads and session management, making it easy to build web applications without heavy dependencies.
items.title: ojiiis/ojparty: OJParty is a lightweight Node.js framework that enhances the default HTTP module by offering Express-like routing with added support for file uploads and session management, making it easy to build web applications without heavy dependencies.

items.content_html: SnapSelect is a JavaScript plugin that is designed to improve the functionality of HTML <select> elements. It is lightweight, customizable, and simple to use. SnapSelect offers a modern and sleek interface with advanced features, while remaining highly configurable and efficient.
items.title: eveltic/snapselect: SnapSelect is a JavaScript plugin that is designed to improve the functionality of HTML <select> elements. It is lightweight, customizable, and simple to use. SnapSelect offers a modern and sleek interface with advanced features, while remaining highly configurable and efficient.

items.content_html: This repository contains a sleek and customizable Date & Time Widget built for easy integration into any web project. The widget displays the current date and time with options for different formats, time zones, and styles. It's lightweight, responsive, and designed to be simple to use while providing a modern and elegant user experience.
items.title: mohammadfaheemmir/Date-Time-Widget: This repository contains a sleek and customizable Date & Time Widget built for easy integration into any web project. The widget displays the current date and time with options for different formats, time zones, and styles. It's lightweight, responsive, and designed to be simple to use while providing a modern and elegant user experience.
